plot: A man named Salem escapes from an insane asylum where he was confined for an axe-murder. Falsely convicted under a plea of &"guilty due to insanity&", he does not plan to let his sister and her husband forget that they were responsible for the murder of a farmhand and for his cruel imprisonment in the asylum.   Written by  alfiehitchie
title: El visitante nocturno
